description.h2: The xbrli:scenario element must not appear in any xbrli:context.
description.p: If the xbrli:scenario element was used, then XBRL requires that it have child elements; however, all dimensions in Interactive Data filings appear in the xbrli:segment element. Therefore, the xbrli:scenario element cannot be used.

variation.name: 6.5.4, Dimension is in segment, GOOD
variation.description: 6.5.4 Tests that no error is reported with segment dimension, GOOD

variation.name: 6.5.4, Dimension is reported in scenario to raise error, NOGOOD
variation.description: 6.5.4 Tests that scenario dimension reports error, NOGOOD

variation.name: 6.5.4, Arbitrary user-defined dimension is reported in scenario to raise error, NOGOOD
variation.description: Arbitrary user-defined dimension is reported in scneario to raise error, NOGOOD
